constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 序列必须严格递增（从底到顶）
constraints.formal: 对于所有 i, A[i] < A[i+1]

constraints.name: max_min_diff_leq_d
constraints.description: 相邻元素差值不超过 d
constraints.formal: 对于所有 i, A[i+1] - A[i] <= d

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.formal: 对于所有 i != j, A[i] != A[j]
